content.rendered:
Cảnh báo:

  • Khi sử dụng EFI tại đây 1 số model các bạn cần chỉnh lại quirks booster trong config theo dortania
  • Khi boot vào macos các bạn cần patch igpu và xóa boot-arg -igfxvesa chi tiết theo links
  • Đối với các bạn boot từ catalina trở xuống thì chỉnh securebootmodel trong config là Disable
  • Các bạn cũng sẽ cần thay SMBIOS cho tất cả EFI lấy về từ đây

EFI Opencore

Laptop

Sandy birdge:

  • chipset 6 series : https://drive.google.com
  • chipset 7 series : https://drive.google.com

Ivy birdge:

  • chipset 6 series : https://drive.google.com
  • chip set 7 series : https://drive.google.com

Haswell:

https://drive.google.com

Boardwell:

https://drive.google.com

Skylake:

https://drive.google.com

 Kaby Lake :

  •  Kaby Lake : https://drive.google.com
  •  Kaby Lake-r : https://drive.google.com

Coffee lake:

  • Coffee Lake and Whiskey Lake : https://drive.google.com
  • Coffee Lake Plus and Comet Lake : https://drive.google.com

Ice lake:

https://drive.google.com

Desktop

Sandy bridge:

https://www.mediafire.com

Ivy bridge:

https://www.mediafire.com

Haswell:

EFI Gen 4 Desktop.zip – Google Drive

Broadwell:

https://www.mediafire.com

Skylake:

https://www.mediafire.com

Kabylake:

https://www.mediafire.com

Coffelake:

https://www.mediafire.com

Comentlake:

https://www.mediafire.com

Lưu ý : 1 số máy các bạn cần chỉnh lại efi theo guide dortania

——————————HẾT——————————

EFI patch full

laptop X450c

https://drive.google.com

https://cloud.degoo.com (new version)

Thinkpad-T460s

https://drive.google.com

Dell3467

https://drive.google.com

hp-Cs-3060TX

https://drive.google.com

hp 15 cx0

https://drive.google.com

desktop H81-Pegatron_E3-1231v3_Rx-560-4G-Sapphire

https://drive.google.com

dellMXXX

https://drive.google.com

hp-100_ivebirdge

https://drive.google.com

laptop X450CC

https://drive.google.com

Clover Ivy-birdge

https://drive.google.com

——————————HẾT——————————

Clover

Clover 5119

https://drive.google.com
